content: i had a request for a half_double_crochet hat using worsted weight cotton yarn i revised my original pattern to work with this slightly heavier weight yarn - if you are looking for the original pattern which uses red heart soft yarn please go to this free pattern link basic half_double_crochet beanie pattern http //www oombawkadesigncrochet com/2014/01/free-crochet-pattern-half-double html please feel free to substitute any yarn/hook combination which allows you to reach the specified gauge thank you and enjoy rhondda oombawka design
